Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Relates to establishing the child victim foundation fund and implementing a supplemental child victim fee
Summary: Establishes the child victim foundation fund; implements a supplemental child victim fee.
LawCode: Add §§209-P & 630-k, Tax L; amd §60.35, Pen L; add §99-oo, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, the penal law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the child victim foundation fund and implementing a supplemental child victim fee
